name: 朴維鎮
objective:
介紹 VBA 語言基本資料處理的概念，包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
This course introduces the basic data processes of EXCEL VBA language. They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.
schedule:
Week 13 Simple linear regression – Part I
Week 14 Simple linear regression – Part II
Week 15 Multiple linear regression – Part I
Week 16 Multiple linear regression – Part II
Week 17 Other aspects of multiple linear regression analysis
Week 18 Final exam ((Take-home or in-class exam)
materials: Engineering Statistics (5th Ed., Wiley) by Montgomery, Runger, and Hubele (ISBN: 978-0-324-59433-1)

name: 鄭辰仰
objective:
介紹 VBA 語言基本資料處理的概念，包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
This course introduces the basic data processes of EXCEL VBA language. They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.
schedule:
1. Getting started with Excel VBA programming
2. Programming concepts
3. Communicating with your users
4. Putting it all together
